transaction_insights.summary: Across 6 months ending 2025-10, outward volumes reached INR 45.0 Mn. International outward payments changed approx. 6% month-on-month. High-risk country share at 8%; cash deposits represent ~4% of outward flows. Candidate triggers identified: TRIG_HIGH_RISK_COUNTRY.

recommended_actions: Conduct an immediate KYB review to update information and assess the current risk profile of ABC Exports Private Limited.
Investigate the nature of transactions involving high-risk countries and implement appropriate monitoring measures.
Establish a more frequent review schedule for KYB assessments to avoid overdue triggers in the future.
Communicate with the entity to understand the rationale behind their transaction patterns, particularly the engagement with high-risk jurisdictions.
Review the background and business activities of the medium-risk directors for any potential discrepancies or risks.
kyb_note: The KYB assessment for ABC Exports Private Limited indicates a heightened risk status, with a score of 47 classified in the RED risk band. Key risk indicators include a recent KYB review that is overdue by more than 18 months and international payments with an 8% share directed towards high-risk countries. Additionally, the presence of medium-risk directors elevates the potential risk profile of the entity. Given these concerns, immediate actions are warranted to mitigate the identified risks and ensure compliance with KYC regulations.

triggers_fired.reason: Last KYB review on 2024-01-20 exceeds 18 month limit.
High-risk country share approx 8% of outward flows.

risk_assessment.overall_reasoning: Base score 20 derived from internal rating MEDIUM for journey type LIMITED_COMPANY_SINGLE. Triggers fired: TRIG_KYB_OVERDUE (Last KYB review on 2024-01-20 exceeds 18 month limit.); TRIG_HIGH_RISK_COUNTRY (High-risk country share approx 8% of outward flows.). Final band RED.

party_summary.key_observations: The entity has a director and a signatory with a medium risk label. Notable parties are residents of India and the UAE. There are no PEP or sanctions flags.
